name: Picoware - Publish or Perish
description:
Made during PICOWARE game jam. This is my first game jam. Had tons of fun making the game. Hope to continue making stupid mini-game about PhD on PICO-8. I have a lot more ideas which I want to implement!

This game is heavily inspired by another submission: https://itch.io/jam/picoware/rate/456855 I used a lot of codes from it.

This mini-game is part of the collection of PICOWARE. Full game is available here: is.gd/picoware
